text: The Battle of Stony Lake was the third and last engagement of Henry Hastings Sibley's 1863 campaign against the Santee, Yankton, Yanktonai and Teton Sioux in Dakota Territory. == Results == 300-400 Native American warriors, women, and children were killed. A mere 40 men perished on the side of the US army. Category:1863 in the United States Stony Lake Stony Lake Category:July events Category:1863 events Stony Lake
title: Battle of Stony Lake
